meanings.definition: To control or manipulate (a situation) with skill or dexterity.
meanings.sent1: She stickhandled the difficult conversation with grace.
meanings.sent2: He stickhandled the project to successful completion.
meanings.sent3: The way she stickhandled the group project was impressive.
meanings.sent4: He stickhandled his way through the maze of paperwork.
meanings.sent5: Her ability to stickhandle challenges made her stand out.

meanings.definition: To maneuver or navigate (an object) with a stick or similar tool.
meanings.sent1: He stickhandled the canoe through the narrow stream.
meanings.sent2: She stickhandled the broom to reach the high shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to stickhandle the toy mouse with its paw.
meanings.sent4: He stickhandled the fishing rod expertly to catch a big fish.
meanings.sent5: She stickhandled the joystick to control the video game character.
